summary: Adds a trapdoor to Millwater Retreat that leads to a dynamic treasure vault, which fills with more and more treasure and gold the more money you add.
descriptionHtml:
Millwater Retreat Dynamic Treasure Vault
Add a hidden underground treasure vault to Millwater Retreat ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36033//? ) and watch it grow with gold and treasure the more gold you put in a conveniently placed strongbox! The vault also have 2 chests, 6 weapon plaques, 12 mannequins and 2 weapon cases for safe storage and to display your finest weapons and armor.

The entrance is a trapdoor hidden behind some flora near Millwater Retreats entrance and smelter. The trapdoor is opened with a key located in the underwater nordic ruin nearby.

The door in the vault is a big dwemer door which might seem strange as you enter through a trapdoor, but I justify that by imagining you\'re traveling through a few hallways before arriving.

Hjerim Dynamic Vault http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36940/?
Adds this vault to Hjerim in Windhelm.

Update 1.6
Added new room leading up to treasure vault with 12 mannequins.

Update 1.5
Changed the lighting in the vault. Added 2 safe storage chests. The shrine of Arkay now part of the main file.

Update 1.2
Adds 6 weaponplaques, 2 display cases and now requires a key to open. Also dimmed the lighting in the vault and moved some candles.

This does not require Millwater Retreat to run, but with it you have a great playerhome close by.

This is a modification of the great mod Als Treasure Vault by AlCiao 
( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9994//? ).
author: mikom31
